newsitem.title: BRAZIL: RESEARCH ALERT - Eletropaulo cut to hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Eletropaulo cut to hold.

text.p: -- Deutsche Morgan Grenfell said it had cut its rating for Brazilian
power distributor Eletropaulo S.A. to hold from a buy.
-- In a Jan 15 report, the firm said it was downgrading the stock
